flawed_nl_solution:
Lucy can read 20 more pages than Oliver who can read 40 pages so Lucy can read 40+20 = <<20+40=40>>40 pages
Carter can read half as many pages as Lucy who can read 40 pages so he can read 40/2 = <<20.0=20.0>>20.0 pages in 1 hour

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
